# PERF_EVENT Component

The PERF_EVENT component enables PAPI to access perf_event CPU counters.

- [Enabling the PERF_EVENT Component](#markdown-header-enabling-the-perf-event-component)

______________________________________________________________________

## Enabling the PERF_EVENT Component

This component is enabled by default.

Typically, the utility `papi_components_avail` (available in `papi/src/utils/papi_components_avail`)
will display the components available to the user, and whether they are disabled, and when they are
disabled why.
